entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is a gamekeeper at Hogwarts and is known for his large size and kind nature. He is trying to teach the class about Thestrals but Umbridge interrupts him.

entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: Umbridge is the new Defense Against the Dark Arts teacher at Hogwarts and is known for her cruel and manipulative nature. She is trying to undermine Hagrid's authority.

entities.name: thestral
entities.description: Thestrals are magical creatures that can only be seen by those who have witnessed death. They are often misunderstood and feared by the wizarding community.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is a Slytherin student at Hogwarts and is known for his arrogance and prejudice. He is laughing along with Pansy Parkinson at Umbridge's antics.

entities.name: pansy parkinson
entities.description: Pansy Parkinson is a Slytherin student at Hogwarts and is known for her mean-spirited nature. She is laughing along with Malfoy at Umbridge's antics.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a Gryffindor student at Hogwarts and is known for her intelligence and bravery. She is furious at Umbridge's behavior.

relationships.description: Hagrid is in conflict with Umbridge as she interrupts his teaching and undermines his authority.
Hermione is angry at Umbridge for her cruel behavior towards Hagrid.
